org.intellimate.izou.security

Class AudioPermissionModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.util.IzouModule
      • org.intellimate.izou.security.PermissionModule
        • org.intellimate.izou.security.AudioPermissionModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, MainProvider

    public final class AudioPermissionModule
extends PermissionModule
    The Audio PermissionModule checks whether one is allowed to play music. It dos not orchestrate the different lines etc. See SoundManager for these functions.
    See Also:
    SoundManager
